Articles.Content:
Hello, is there any kind of document or something outlining how to install pre.20 addons into .20 now?? I have seen a few statements, but would be great to see it actually maybe documented as a 1...2...3... step type thing?

Thanks, WMC

It's easy enough, plenty of info here

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/30559-20-And-mods

Step 1: Install the addon to the same place you did in 0.19.

Step 2: Play the game.

PS: if the attach nodes don't line up there is some CFG file editing required, see the above link.

PPS: if it is a PLUGIN, not just a part, then you may have to give up and play on the older version in order to use it.
